availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander G. Hamilton (Floyd County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Floyd County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Minerva Hamilton. Father of Cynthia Ann Hamilton, Stephen Hamilton, Rhoda Hamilton, Tandy Hamilton, Agnes Hamilton, and Mary Hamilton. Farmer in Floyd County in 1860. Third lieutenant in the 38th Enrolled Militia of Floyd County.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, p. 18. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, Precinct No 2, p. 4. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, Precinct No 2 (Middle Creek), p. 9.
KYR-0002-022-0002.
